title: FaaSr invocation payload
description: Schema for an invocation of FaaSr

FunctionInvoke.description: The name of the R function to be invoked by this action

InvocationID.description: The unique ID used throughout all action invocations for this workflow

LoggingServer.description: The name of the logging server to use - must match an S3 server defined under DataStores

FunctionList.description: A list of one or more functions that describes the workflow

ComputeServers.description: A list of one or more FaaS compute servers used in the workflow

DataStores.description: A list of one or more S3 data servers used in the workflow
